column3: wɔtoow Jeriko mu twitwiitwi a obi mmfi mu mmpue
Hwɛ
column6: nye ne mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam no nyinara ahyɛ wo nsa."

column3: mbarimba akofo nyinara mbɔ kurow no ho aprɔw prɛko. Yɛ no dɛm nda esia."

column2: "Na asɔfo beesuon mfa nguannyin mmbɛn mbɛn esuon ndzi adaka no enyim: Na da a otsia esuon no hom nkyin kurow no ho mpɛn esuon
column3: na asɔfo no nhɛn mbɛn no."
sɛ wɔhɛn oguannyin abɛn no ma ɔkyɛr a
column4: na sɛ hom tse abɛn no ne ndze a
column5: ɔman no nyinara mfa huro kɛse mbɔ ose; na kurow no ho fasu no bodwuruw egu famu dɛfɛɛ
column6: na ɔman no mu obiara ndua n’enyim tsentsendo mfow nkɔ."

column3: Nun ne babanyin no
column7: na wɔmma asɔfo beesuon mfa nguannyin mmbɛn mbɛn esuon ndzi EWURADZE n’adakaa no enyim."

column3: Hom ntwa mu nkɔbɔ kurow no ho aprɔw
column4: na wɔmma mbarimba a woemia no ntwa mu nkedzi EWURADZE n’adakaa no enyim."

column3: aber a Josua kasaa kyerɛɛ ɔman no
column4: asɔfo beesuon no a wɔdze nguannyin mmbɛn mbɛn esuon dzi EWURADZE enyim no twaa mu
column5: na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn no: na EWURADZE n’ahyɛmudaka no toaa hɔn do."

column2: "Na mbarimba a woemia no dzii asɔfo a wɔhɛn mbɛn no enyim
column3: na nkyidɔm no dzii adaka no ekyir. Wɔnam rokɔ no nna asɔfo no rehɛn mbɛn no."
Mma hom mmbɔ ose
column5: mma asɛm bi mmfi hom anomu mmpue
column6: kyerɛ da a mebɛse hom dɛ wɔmbɔ ose no; nna hom mbɔ ose."

column2: "Nna ɔmaa EWURADZE n’adakaa no kekyiin kurow no ho
column3: kɔbɔɔ ho aprɔw prɛko: na wɔbaa nseraban no mu
na asɔfo no maa EWURADZE n’adakaa no do."

column2: "Na asɔfo beesuon no a wokitsakitsa nguannyin mmbɛn mbɛn esuon no nantsewee dzii EWURADZE n’adakaa no enyim
column3: na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn no. Nna mbarimba a woemia no dzi hɔn enyim; na nkyidɔm no dzi EWURADZE n’adakaa no ekyir
column4: asɔfo no nam rokɔ no nyina nna wɔrehɛn mbɛn no."

column2: "Na da a otsia ebien no wokyiin kurow no ho prɛko
column3: na wɔsanee kɔr nseraban no mu: wɔyɛɛ dɛm ara nda esia."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia esuon no
column3: wɔsoɛɛr ahanamakye a enyim rebaabaa no
column4: na wokekyiin kurow no ho dɛmara mpɛn esuon: da no nko ara na wɔbɔɔ kurow no ho aprɔw mpɛn esuon."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a asɔfo no hɛɛn mbɛn no
column3: wɔ aprɔwbɔ a otsia mpɛn esuon no
column5: Hom mbɔ ose; na EWURADZE dze kurow no ama hom."

column2: "Na kurow no nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara
column3: nyɛ adze a EWURADZE dze ne nsa ato do: mbom
column4: ɔbaa huhunyi Rahab nko na ɔnka
column5: ɔno nye hɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ fie no nyinara
column6: osiandɛ ɔdze abɔfo a yɛsomaa hɔn no sumae."

column3: hom ho ara na hom nhwɛ no yie wɔ adze a woetu esi hɔ ama ɔsɛɛ no ho
column4: ɔno bɛyɛ na hom afa adze a wɔadom no bi; na hom ayɛ ma Israel nseraban ayɛ ebusudze

column3: sika
column4: boran nye dadze ndzɛmba nyinara dze
column5: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn mma EWURADZE: wɔmfa mbra EWURADZE n’adzekorabea."

column3: na asɔfo no hɛɛn mbɛn no: na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: aber a ɔman no tsee abɛn no ndze no
column6: na fasu no dwuruwii guu famu dɛfɛɛ
column7: ma ɔman no fowee kɔr kurow no mu

column2: "Na wɔdze afona kunkum dza ɔwɔ kurow no mu nyinara pasapasa
column3: ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa

column2: "Na Josua see mbanyin beenu a wɔkɛseraa asaase no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ ɔbaa huhunyi no ne fie
column5: nye dza ɔwɔ nyinara mfi hɔ mbra
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hom kaa ntam kyerɛɛ no no."

column3: na wɔdze Rahab
column7: nye dza ɔwɔ nyinara puei bae; na wokegyaa hɔn wɔ Israel nseraban no ekyir."

column3: nye dza ɔwɔ mu nyinara: dwetɛ
column5: na boran nye dadze ndzɛmba no ara nko
column6: na wɔdze kɔr EWURADZE ne fie adzekorabea no mu."

column3: na n’egya ne fifo
column5: Josua gyee hɔn nkwa; na ɔtsenaa Israel mu araa dze bodu ndɛ da yi; osiandɛ ɔdze abɔfo a Josua somaa hɔn dɛ wɔnkɛsera Jeriko no sumae."

column2: "Na Josua dze ntam braa hɔn aber no mu dɛ
column3: Nyimpa a ɔbɔsoɛr abɛkyekyer Jeriko kurow yi
column4: mpaa nka no wɔ EWURADZE enyim: ɔdze n’abakan bɔtow ne fapem
column5: na ɔdze ne ba kaekyir banyin esisi n’ano mbobotsen."

column2: "Na EWURADZE dzii Josua n’ekyir; na ne nka tahyee asaase no nyinara do."
